title: client keeps not letting me play on and offf
body: it will let me play a couple games in the day and randomly do this and refuse to let me play till the games over,this has been a problem for a few people not all,its not me at all because all the other games i play give me no error or disconnect,is this because of the new client thats coming?

replies.body:
This is definitely *not caused* by the Alpha client since you're not running the Alpha client when trying to connect to games. Game crashes can be caused by a number of different factors, ranging from permissions problems to driver or hardware issues. I strongly recommend working through our [Crashing guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) as a first step.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
